text: Lochaber RFC is a rugby union side based in Fort William, Scotland. The club was founded in 1969. They play at the Banavie ground. ==History== Founded in 1969, the club managed to get the council to provide a pitch in 1984. A temporary clubhouse was built in 1988; this lasted until 1997 when a new clubhouse was built. The club runs boys and girls sections from Primary 3 upwards. ==Lochaber Sevens== The club host an annual rugby Sevens tournament. ==Honours== * Lochaber Sevens ** Champions: 1981, 1987, 1990 * Bearsden Sevens ** Champions: 1993 == References == Category:Rugby union in Highland Category:Scottish rugby union teams Category:Fort William, Highland Category:Rugby clubs established in 1969
title: Lochaber RFC
